name: [SRETUSLO] filler is dropping metrics [TF]
description: Metrics are being dropped before being published to Beeinstana and Cassandra. ## Consequences This will cause metrics not to be ingested. ## Remediation - If you see this error for several fillers in one region this indicates problems with the Kafka cluster. This is not valid for self-hosted installations. - Check the logs to see if any unexpected errors have occurred. - Check Beeinstana logs - Restart `filler` To get more context: [ðŸ”µ](https://blue-instanaops.instana.io/#/customDashboards/view;dashboardId=C3eN96Z8RyOJ7ycpgHkK5Q) [ðŸŸ¢](https://green-instanaops.instana.io/#/customDashboards/view;dashboardId=NXPy2nCSSeOsiKS2Rd6O-g) [ðŸ”´](https://red-instanaops.instana.io/#/customDashboards/view;dashboardId=XvhTJitbRAmM3hhMOOKPbQ) [ðŸŸ ](https://orange-instanaops.instana.io/#/customDashboards/view;dashboardId=4YntvQ3eSsaJ-BUXgoB2Wg)
